sentences.en: All large ships now have a wireless installation.
sentences.cn: 所有的大型船舶现在都有无线电装置.

sentences.en: Also, a full set of pamphlets dealing with installation, operation, maintenance and service.
sentences.cn: 此外, 成套的安装 、 操作 、 维修和服务小册子.

sentences.en: Flexible tubing can assist in installation in tight space.
sentences.cn: 柔性管道便于在紧凑的空间安装.

sentences.en: He sent a letter inviting Naomi to attend his installation as chief of his tribe.
sentences.cn: 他给娜奥米寄了封信，邀请她来参加他就任部落酋长的仪式。

sentences.en: Hundreds of lives could be saved if the installation of alarms was more widespread.
sentences.cn: 如果报警器得到更广泛的安装，成百上千的生命就可能被挽救。

sentences.en: One, a complete set of blueprints for installation purpose.
sentences.cn: 首先, 成套的机器安装图.

sentences.en: The analyzer is suitable for fields installation.
sentences.cn: 这个分析仪适于室外安装.

sentences.en: The computer manager is the administrative and technical head of the installation.
sentences.cn: 计算机主任是计算机服务中心的行政和技术主管人.

sentences.en: The electric drive system is made detachable for ease of transportation and installation.
sentences.cn: 为了便于运输和安装,电力驱动系做成可以拆卸的.

sentences.en: the installation and maintenance of alarm systems
sentences.cn: 警报系统的安装和维护

sentences.en: the installation of the new bishop
The original installation receiving antenna, strengthens the signal receptivity.
sentences.cn: 原装接收天线, 加强信号接收能力.

sentences.en: The whole computer installation was nearly new.
sentences.cn: 整套电脑设备几乎是全新的。

sentences.en: Their installation proved a laborious undertaking.
sentences.cn: 要来安顿这些人,确实是一件麻烦的事情.

sentences.en: These fears have resulted from the development and installation of nuclear power plants.
sentences.cn: 核电站的设计和建设是产生这种忧虑的原因.

sentences.en: They reduce losses, but they do not make installation of abatement equipment profitable.
sentences.cn: 津贴法减少了损失, 但是津贴不能使减污设备的安装从中获利.

sentences.en: This system is approved in California for local smog - station installation.
sentences.cn: 这种系统已通过了加利福尼亚州城市烟雾站的鉴定.

sentences.en: Tundish and ladle safety linings, ladle bottom and mending installation of ladles.
sentences.cn: 钢包、中间包永久衬, 钢包底,钢包衬补浇等.
